intro: Psychotria pyramidalis, commonly known as the pyramid psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its upright growth habit and dark green, lance-shaped leaves. It produces small, white to pale yellow flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. Psychotria pyramidalis is often found in humid, shaded environments such as rainforests and understory habitats.
